description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement to purchase 1 aluminium hull, walk-around Centre Console, Jet Runabout and trailer built in accordance with the Technical Statement of Requirement (TSOR) - Annex "A" and Bidder Questions and Canada Responses Annex "D".
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
* **Notification Reference Number (RFB)**: PW-_XLV-597-8439
* **Solicitation Reference Number**: FW061-230002/A
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 20, 2023, at 5:00 PM EDT
* **Government Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **End User Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Title**: Maximum 6.0 Metre Aluminium Hull Jet Boat
## Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking proposals for the purchase of a Maximum 6.0 Metre Aluminium Hull, Walkaround Centre Console Jet Runabout and trailer, as detailed in the documents below.

- **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), among other trade agreements.
- **Tendering Procedures**: Qualified bids are required.
- **Competitive Procurement Strategy**: Lowest/Lower Bid. 
- **Security**: No security is required.
- **Delivery Date**: Above-mentioned.

**Additional Details**

The purchase is subject to Canada's free trade agreements with Colombia, Chile, Honduras, Korea, Panama, and Peru, as well as General Supply Arrangement (GSA) No. E60MC-190001.

Suppliers that are not currently registered under a GSA must register prior to submitting a bid. For more information about registering for a GSA visit [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

**Bid Submissions**
Bidder must submit their proposals in one of Canada's official languages, either English or French.

**Contact Information**

Kathy Large
E-mail: [kathy.large@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:kathy.large@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
Telephone: (250) 216-4455

*   A full list of tender documents may be found on [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) by referencing Solicitation Number FW061-230002/A.
*   Submit bids electronically through CanadaBuys <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/> (vendors may be required to complete a quick login to submit bids).**
*   Please note all bids must
